languages.text: {n}Идира прыскает, подавляя смешок.{/n} "Мне? Точно нет, Лорд-капитан. Не знаю, кому Леди Теодора могла рассказывать о таком, но точно не м..." {n}Псайкер осекается, словно прислушиваясь к чему-то. Лицо женщины покрывает тень скорби.{/n} "Зачем вы нашептываете мне это сейчас, зачем?.."

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира прыскает, подавляя смешок.{/n} "Мне? Точно нет, Лорд-капитан. Не знаю, кому леди Теодора могла рассказывать о таком, но точно не м..." {n}Псайкер осекается, словно прислушиваясь к чему-то. Лицо женщины покрывает тень скорби.{/n} "Зачем вы нашептываете мне это сейчас, зачем?.."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira snorts, suppressing a laugh.{/n} "Me? Not a clue, Lord Captain. I don't know who Lady Theodora would've told about a thing like that, but it definitely wasn't m—" {n}She breaks off, appearing to listen to something. Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

languages.text: {n}Idira reprime una carcajada.{/n} «¿Yo? Nada de nada, Lord Capitán. No me imagino a quién le contaría lady Theodora algo semejante, pero desde luego no ha sido a m...». {n}Guarda silencio de repente, como si hubiese oído algo. Una repentina expresión de pesar ensombrece su rostro.{/n} «¿Por qué has tenido que susurrarme eso ahora? ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts, suppressing a laugh.{/n} "Me? Not a clue, Lord Captain. I don't know who Lady Theodora would've told about a thing like that, but it definitely wasn't m—" {n}She breaks off, appearing to listen to something. Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira reprime una carcajada.{/n} «¿Yo? Nada de nada, Lord Capitán. No me imagino a quién le contaría lady Theodora algo semejante, pero desde luego no ha sido a m...». {n}Guarda silencio de repente, como si hubiese oído algo. Una repentina expresión de pesar ensombrece su rostro.{/n} «¿Por qué has tenido que susurrarme eso ahora? ¿Por qué?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは鼻を鳴らし、笑わないように努めている。{/n}「あたいが？知らないわ、ロード・キャプテン。レディ・シオドーラがそんな大事なことを誰に教たりしたのかは知らないけれど、少なくともあたいではな―」{n}彼女は言葉を止め、何かに聞き入る。悲しみが彼女の顔を覆う。{/n}「どうして今そんなことを囁くの？なぜ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts, suppressing a laugh.{/n} "Me? Not a clue, Lord Captain. I don't know who Lady Theodora would've told about a thing like that, but it definitely wasn't m—" {n}She breaks off, appearing to listen to something. Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは鼻を鳴らし、笑わないように努めている。{/n}「あたいが？知らないわ、ロード・キャプテン。レディ・シオドーラがそんな大事なことを誰に教たりしたのかは知らないけれど、少なくともあたいではな―」{n}彼女は言葉を止め、何かに聞き入る。悲しみが彼女の顔を覆う。{/n}「どうして今そんなことを囁くの？なぜ？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉轻哼了一声，忍住不笑出声。{/n}“我？我可不知道，舰长大人。我不知道西奥多拉夫人会把这些事情告诉谁，但肯定不会告诉我……”{n}她停顿了一下，似乎在听着什么。随后，悲伤像阴影一样掠过她的脸庞。{/n}“你为什么现在要对我悄悄说这些话？为什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts, suppressing a laugh.{/n} "Me? Not a clue, Lord Captain. I don't know who Lady Theodora would've told about a thing like that, but it definitely wasn't m—" {n}She breaks off, appearing to listen to something. Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉轻哼了一声，忍住不笑出声。{/n}“我？我可不知道，舰长大人。我不知道西奥多拉夫人会把这些事情告诉谁，但肯定不会告诉我……”{n}她停顿了一下，似乎在听着什么。随后，悲伤像阴影一样掠过她的脸庞。{/n}“你为什么现在要对我悄悄说这些话？为什么？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira s'étrangle en réprimant un éclat de rire.{/n} « Moi ? Aucune idée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne sais pas à qui dame Théodora aurait pu révéler ce genre d'informations, mais certainement pas à m... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et semble écouter quelque chose. Une ombre de chagrin passe sur son visage.{/n} « Pourquoi est-ce que vous me murmurez ça maintenant ? Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts, suppressing a laugh.{/n} "Me? Not a clue, Lord Captain. I don't know who Lady Theodora would've told about a thing like that, but it definitely wasn't m—" {n}She breaks off, appearing to listen to something. Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira s'étrangle en réprimant un éclat de rire.{/n} « Moi ? Aucune idée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne sais pas à qui dame Théodora aurait pu révéler ce genre d'informations, mais certainement pas à m... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et semble écouter quelque chose. » Une ombre de chagrin passe sur son visage.{/n} « Pourquoi est-ce que vous me murmurez ça maintenant ? Pourquoi ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira prustet kurz los und hat Mühe, ein Lachen zu unterdrücken.{/n} "Ich? Keinen Schimmer, Lord Captain. Ich weiß nicht, wem Lady Theodora so etwas gesagt hätte, aber definitiv nicht m-"{n} Sie verstummt und lauscht offenbar auf etwas. Trauer legt sich auf ihre Miene wie ein Schatten.{/n} "Warum flüstert Ihr mir das ausgerechnet jetzt zu? Warum?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts, suppressing a laugh.{/n} "Me? Not a clue, Lord Captain. I don't know who Lady Theodora would've told about a thing like that, but it definitely wasn't m—" {n}She breaks off, appearing to listen to something. Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

languages.text: {n}Kahkahasını bastırmaya çalışan İdira homurdanıyor.{/n} "Benim mi? Hiç bilgim yok Lord Kaptan. Leydi Theodora bu tür bir bilgiyi kiminle paylaşmıştır, bilemem ama kesinlikle benimle değ..." {n}Kulağını başka bir sese vermişçesine duraksıyor. Kederli bir ifade, yüzünden gölge misali geçip gidiyor.{/n} "Bu fısıltıyı neden kulaklarım şimdi işitiyor? Neden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts, suppressing a laugh.{/n} "Me? Not a clue, Lord Captain. I don't know who Lady Theodora would've told about a thing like that, but it definitely wasn't m—" {n}She breaks off, appearing to listen to something. Grief passes over her face like a shadow.{/n} "Why would you whisper that to me now? Why?"

Kederli bir ifade, yüzünden âdeta bir gölge gibi geçip gidiyor.{/n} "Bu fısıltıyı neden kulaklarım şimdi işitiyor? Neden?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
